servinfo.title: DTC P1676: CAN Communication (Reception Error for TCM (for A/T model))

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to DTC P1674: CAN Communication (Bus Off Error) .

servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

entry.ptxt: Reception error of communication data for TCM is detected for longer than specified time continuously.

s1.ptxt: Connect scan tool to DLC with ignition switch turned OFF.
Turn ON ignition switch and clear DTC by using scan tool.
Start engine and run it for 1 min. or more.

attention3.ptxt: Before this trouble shooting is performed, read the precautions for DTC troubleshooting referring to Precautions For DTC Troubleshooting .

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Step 2.
Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check .

testgroup.title: DTC check

test1.ptxt: Connect scan tool to DLC with ignition switch turned OFF.
Check ECM, TCM (for A/T model), ABS hydraulic unit / control module assembly, 4WD control module (for J20 engine), keyless start control module (if equipped) and BCM for DTC.

testgroup.question: Is there any DTC(s) other than CAN communication DTC(s) at each control module (other than DTC P1618, P1674, P1676, P1678, P1685 in ECM, DTC P1774, P1777, P1778 in TCM (for A/T model), DTC U1073, U1100, U1101, U1121 in BCM, ABS hydraulic unit / control module assembly and 4WD control module (for J20 engine), and DTC No.31 / 33 in keyless start control module (if equipped))?

action.ptxt: Go to applicable DTC diag. flow.
Go to Step 3.

testgroup.title: Check CAN communication error for ECM

test1.ptxt: Check ECM for DTC.

testgroup.question: Is there DTC P1674?

action.ptxt: Go to DTC P1674: CAN Communication (Bus Off Error) .
Go to Step 4.

testgroup.title: ECM, ABS hydraulic unit / control module and TCM (for A/T model) connector check

test1.ptxt: Check for proper connection at each ECM, ABS hydraulic unit / control module and TCM (for A/T model) connector terminals with ignition switch turned OFF.
If connections are OK, recheck ECM for DTC with engine running.

testgroup.question: Is there DTC P1676?

action.ptxt: Go to Step 5.
Intermittent trouble. Check for intermittent referring to Intermittent and Poor Connection Inspection .

testgroup.title: ECM power and ground circuit check

test1.ptxt: Check ECM power and ground circuits referring to ECM Power and Ground Circuit Check .

testgroup.question: Are they in good condition?

action.ptxt: Go to Step 6.
Repair ECM power and/or ground circuits.

testgroup.title: DTC check in TCM (for A/T model)

test1.ptxt: Check DTC P1774 in TCM (for A/T model).

testgroup.question: Is it indicated?

action.ptxt: Go to DTC P1774: CAN Communication Bus Off .
Go to Step 7.

test1.ptxt: Disconnect connector from BCM with ignition switch turned OFF.
Check ECM for DTC(s).

action.ptxt: Go to Step 8.
“G31-1” or “G31-3” circuit wire between BCM and CAN circuit junction connector is open or high resistance. If wires are OK, substitute a known-good BCM and recheck.

test1.ptxt: Disconnect connectors from TCM (for A/T model) with ignition switch turned OFF.
Check ECM for DTC.

action.ptxt: Go to Step 9.
“E92-17” or “E92-7” circuit wire between TCM and CAN circuit junction connector is open or high resistance. If wires are OK, substitute a known-good TCM (for A/T model) and recheck.

test1.ptxt: Disconnect connector from keyless start control module (if equipped) with ignition switch turned OFF.
Check ECM for DTC.

action.ptxt: Go to Step 10.

“G44-19” or “G44-18” circuit wire between keyless start control module and CAN circuit junction connector is open or high resistance. If wires are OK, substitute a known-good keyless start control module and recheck.

test1.ptxt: Disconnect connector from combination meter with ignition switch turned OFF.
Check ECM for DTC.

action.ptxt: Go to Step 11.

“G28-10” or “G28-8” circuit wire between combination meter and CAN circuit junction connector is open or high resistance. If wires are OK, substitute a known-good combination meter or keyless start control module (if equipped) and recheck.

test1.ptxt: Disconnect connector from 4WD control module (for J20 engine) with ignition switch turned OFF.
Check ECM for DTC.

action.ptxt: Go to Step 12.
“E91-22” or “E91-23” circuit wire between 4WD control module and CAN circuit junction connector is open or high resistance. If wires are OK, substitute a known-good 4WD control module and recheck.

testgroup.title: ABS hydraulic unit / control module check

test1.ptxt: Measure resistance at following connector terminals.

item.ptxt: Between “E03-8” terminal and “E03-6” terminal of ABS hydraulic unit / control module connector.
Between “E03-10” terminal and “E03-12” terminal of ABS hydraulic unit / control module connector.

testgroup.question: Is measured resistance below 1 Ω?

action.ptxt: Go to Step 13.
Substitute a known-good ABS hydraulic unit / control module and recheck.

testgroup.title: CAN communication line circuit continuity check

test1.ptxt: Disconnect connectors from all control modules communicating by CAN with ignition switch turned OFF.
Measure resistance at following connector terminals.

item.ptxt: Between “E23-4” terminal of ECM connector and “E03-10” terminal of ABS hydraulic unit / control module connector
Between “E23-19” terminal of ECM connector and “E03-8” terminal of ABS hydraulic unit / control module connector
Between “E03-12” terminal of ABS hydraulic unit / control module connector and “E92-17” terminal of TCM connector
Between “E03-6” terminal of ABS hydraulic unit / control module connector and “E92-7” terminal of TCM connector

testgroup.question: Is each resistance below 1 Ω?

action.ptxt: Go to Step 14.
Repair open or high resistance of CAN communication line circuit referring to Precaution for CAN Communication System .

testgroup.title: CAN communication line circuit insulation check

test1.ptxt: Measure resistance at following connector terminals.

item.ptxt: Between “E23-4” and “E23-19” terminal of ECM connector
Between “E92-17” and “E92-7” terminal of TCM connector

testgroup.question: Is reach resistance infinity?

action.ptxt: Go to Step 15.
Repair insulation of CAN communication line circuit referring to Precaution for CAN Communication System .

testgroup.title: CAN communication line circuit ground short check

test1.ptxt: Measure resistance at following connector terminals.

item.ptxt: Between “E23-4” terminal of ECM connector and vehicle body ground
Between “E23-19” terminal of ECM connector and vehicle body ground
Between “E92-7” terminal of TCM connector and vehicle body ground
Between “E92-17” terminal of TCM connector and vehicle body ground

testgroup.question: Is each resistance infinity?

action.ptxt: Go to Step 16.
Repair short to ground of CAN communication line circuit referring to Precaution for CAN Communication System .

testgroup.title: Check for short circuit of CAN communication line to power circuit

test1.ptxt: Measure voltage at following connector terminals with ignition switch turned ON.

item.ptxt: Between “E23-4” terminal of ECM connector and vehicle body ground
Between “E23-19” terminal of ECM connector and vehicle body ground
Between “E92-7” terminal of TCM connector and vehicle body ground
Between “E92-17” terminal of TCM connector and vehicle body ground

testgroup.question: Is each voltage 0 – 1 V?

action.ptxt: Go to Step 17.
Repair short to power supply of CAN communication line circuit referring to Precaution for CAN Communication System .

test1.ptxt: Connect connectors to all control modules communicating by CAN with ignition switch turned OFF.
Check DTC U1101 in BCM.

action.ptxt: Check TCM power and ground circuit. If circuit is OK, substitute a known-good TCM and recheck.
Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
